code: import React from"react";import"./Countdown.css";import{useWorkout}from"../components/WorkoutProvider.tsx";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Countdown(){const{timeLeft,current,restSeconds,isResting,setCount,isRunning,pause,resume,skip,reset}=useWorkout();const totalDuration=isResting?restSeconds:current.time;const degree=360/totalDuration*(totalDuration-timeLeft);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"countdown",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"set-rep-line",children:isResting?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Resting..."}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[current.sets!==null&&current.sets>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"set",children:`Set ${setCount} of ${current.sets}`}):null," ",current.reps!==null&&current.reps>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"rep",children:`Reps: ${current.reps}`}):null]})})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"part seconds",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"number",style:{"--degree":`${degree}deg`},children:timeLeft}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text",children:[isResting?"Next exercise: ":"",current.name]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"controls",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:isRunning?pause:resume,children:isRunning?"Pause":"Play"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:skip,children:"Skip"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:reset,children:"Reset"})]})]});}
